description:
Automated exchange of data between cloud applications, databases and files on Windows, MacOS and Linux devices.

Invantive Data Hub transports data between cloud applications, relational databases and files in one integrated solution. Invantive Data Hub scales from small to large enterprises through the solid foundation on Invantive UniversalSQL, including many complex data filters, and transparant parallel execution using high-performance streaming of data for SQL queries. Invantive Data Hub reliably handles large volumes of data on Windows, MacOS and Linux. The headless capability eases integration with the task scheduler of choice such as Windows Task Scheduler or the Linux cron daemon.
